title: #36 - SPECIAL: DALL-E 2 Pricing Breakdown, Announcement Reaction, Commercialization, and more!

media:group.media:title: #36 - SPECIAL: DALL-E 2 Pricing Breakdown, Announcement Reaction, Commercialization, and more!
media:group.media:description:
Welcome back to Multimodal!  This episode, we are discussing OpenAI's latest announcement - DALL-E 2 is entering the beta stage and we now have pricing details for DALL-E as well!  I'm going to be discussing my thoughts on this announcement and what it means for the future of the DALL-E 2 product and community.

Show Notes/Links
DALL-E 2 Pricing Announcement:
https://openai.com/blog/dall-e-now-available-in-beta/

Timestamps
00:00 - Introduction
02:51 - OpenAI DALL-E 2 Announcement Breakdown
06:12 - DALL-E 2 Flow State
12:12 - OpenAI Pricing Rollout
13:00 - Why I'm Reversing my DALL-E 2 Valuation
15:08 - Credits based pricing
15:40 - Is DALL-E 2 a stock photography site (?)
18:17 - Prediction: DALL-E 2 Churn Rate/Retention for Users
19:43 - GPT-3 vs DALL-E Product Launches 
21:24 - Advice for New DALL-E Users
24:35 - Final Thoughts on DALL-E 2 Announcement
26:00 - DALL-E 2 Commercialization Thoughts, Economic Empowerment
31:10 - GPT-X, DALL-E, and our Multimodal Future Part II
33:35 - Y Combinator for DALL-E 2 Artists
34:30 - Bakz T. Future Season 2
37:10 - Closing Thoughts
